message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $950000. I think this is a fair price considering its value to you, but I'm open to negotiations.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the uniqueness of the product, but I believe we can find a price closer to my budget. I am willing to pay $850000 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand that you're looking for a better price, but I'm still confident in the value of this product. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $900000. I think this is a fair compromise considering the uniqueness of the product.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the value I place on the product, I would like to propose a price of $875000.

I understand that you're still looking for a better price, Bob. However, I'm getting close to my minimum acceptable price. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer the product to you for $885000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
Thank you for your latest offer, Alice. I value the product, but I must stick to my budget. I am willing to pay $880000 for the product.

I'm getting close to my limit, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to be closer to my minimum acceptable price. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $890000. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
Thank you for your last offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. I am willing to pay $887500 for the product.

I'm getting close to my limit, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to be closer to my minimum acceptable price. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $892500. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
Thank you for your final offer, Alice. I appreciate your effort. I am willing to pay $890000 for the product.
